title: B minor melodic dictation - treble, compound met

content.question: The melody will be played four times. There will be a pause of 30 seconds after the first playing and a one-minute pause after each subsequent playing. There are no rests in the melody you will hear. It will be played on a flute. The pitch of the first note has been provided. Be sure to notate the rhythm of that note. Now listen to the melody for the first time and begin to notate it.

frqParts.text: The melody will be played four times. There will be a pause of 30 seconds after the first playing and a one-minute pause after each subsequent playing. There are no rests in the melody you will hear. It will be played on a flute. The pitch of the first note has been provided. Be sure to notate the rhythm of that note. Now listen to the melody for the first time and begin to notate it.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Notate the pitches and rhythm of a performed melody (in treble or bass clef; in a major or minor key; may include chromatically altered pitches).
